import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; const AboutPage = () => { const [contentLoaded, setContentLoaded] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // Simulate content loading const timer = setTimeout(() => { setContentLoaded(true); }, 400); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); if (!contentLoaded) { return (
); } return (

About I.D.C.

The Indian Developer Community - Bridging Innovation and Opportunity

üéØ Our Vision

To democratize access to opportunities, knowledge, and networks for every developer in India, fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration.

üöÄ Our Mission

Build a unified platform that nurtures innovation through events, curated learning, peer support, and industry collaboration across all skill levels.

üí° What We Do

We host hackathons & challenges, publish tech trend digests, curate skill tracks, unlock career pathways, and enable meaningful networking.

Our Journey

2025 - Foundation

I.D.C. was founded with a vision to connect developers across India and create opportunities for growth and innovation.

Growing Community

Building a strong foundation with focus on hackathons, tech news, learning resources, and career opportunities.

Future Goals

Expanding nationwide, partnering with top companies, and becoming India's premier developer community platform.

Our Impact

500+ Active Members
20+ Events Hosted
50+ Projects Created
10+ Industry Partners

Our Core Values

Collaboration

We believe in the power of working together to achieve greater goals.

üåü

Innovation

üìà

Growth

üéØ

Excellence

Striving for the highest quality in everything we do.

Community Leadership

I.D.C. is led by passionate developers and tech enthusiasts who are committed to building a thriving ecosystem for the Indian developer community.

Want to join our leadership team? Partner with us and contribute to our mission.
